name: protein-modeling
description: Protein model organization platform for academic programs

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.postinstall: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../server && npx prisma generate
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:migrate:dev: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
